Package com.vaadin.addon.charts.model

Interface Summary
ChartEnum Interface shared by all enum classes of the vaadin charts.
ConfigurationMutationListener Deprecated. usage of this interface is currently reserved for internal use of the library
MarkerSymbol Interface for all marker symbols
Series Series interface for all kinds of Series
 

Class Summary
AbstractAreaPlotOptions  
AbstractCommonPlotOptions This abstract class has some options that are relevant to many, but not all, chart types.
AbstractConfigurationObject Abstract base class for model classes to be serialized to JSON.
AbstractLinePlotOptions  
AbstractPlotOptions Plot options are used to customize the representation of the chart.
AbstractPointPlotOptions  
AbstractSeries Abstract base class for series
AbstractTitle Abstract base for Title classes (namely Title and Subtitle)
Axis Abstract Axis class.
AxisList Alternative AxisContainer to allow multiple axes
Background An object, or array of objects, for backgrounds.
BoxPlotItem A DataSeriesItem implementation suitable for box plot charts.
ChartModel Chart model class
ChartType The default series type for the chart.
Configuration Chart's configuration root object containing all the child objects that are used to configure chart, axes, legend, titles etc.
ConfigurationMutationListener.DataAddedEvent  
ConfigurationMutationListener.DataRemovedEvent  
ConfigurationMutationListener.DataUpdatedEvent  
ConfigurationMutationListener.SeriesEnablationEvent Listener class for Series enabling and disabling events.
ConfigurationMutationListener.SeriesEvent  
ConfigurationMutationListener.SeriesItemEvent  
ContainerDataSeries A series that wraps a Vaadin Container.
CreditPosition Position configuration for the credits label.
Credits A credits label is put in the lower right corner of the chart by default.
DataSeries An array of data points to be displayed in a chart.
DataSeriesItem The DataSeriesItem class represents a single entry in a DataSeries.
DataSeriesItem3d DataSeriesItem that can hold also Z value.
DateTimeLabelFormats For a DATETIME axis, the scale will automatically adjust to the appropriate unit.
Dial The Dial class contains options for the dial or arrow pointer of a gauge chart.
Exporting These properties can be used to configure downloading and printing of the chart.
HTMLLabelItem A HTML label that can be positioned anywhere in the chart area.
HTMLLabels HTML labels that can be positioned anywhere in the chart area.
Labels The axis labels show the numeric value or category name for each tick.
Lang Language object.
Legend The legend is a box containing a symbol and name for each series item or point item in the chart.
ListSeries A series consisting of a list of numerical values.
Marker Marker (symbol) for series points
MarkerStates States for markers (like symbols in plot line)
MarkerSymbolUrl Symbol that is fetched from the url, implementing ChartEnum to provide correct serialization
Pane Applies only to polar charts and angular gauges.
PaneList Pane Container to allow multiple Panes
PlotBand A colored band stretching across the plot area marking an interval on the axis.
PlotBandLabel Text labels for the plot bands
PlotLine A line stretching across the plot area, marking a specific value on one of the axes.
PlotOptionsArea Plot options for ChartType.AREA
PlotOptionsAreaRange Plot options for ChartType.AREARANGE
PlotOptionsAreaSpline Plot options for ChartType.AREASPLINE
PlotOptionsAreaSplineRange Plot options for ChartType.AREASPLINERANGE
PlotOptionsBar Plot options that are specific for ChartType.BAR charts
PlotOptionsBoxPlot Plot options that are specific for ChartType.BOXPLOT charts
PlotOptionsBubble  
PlotOptionsColumn Plot options that are specific for ChartType.COLUMN charts
PlotOptionsColumnRange Plot options that are specific for ChartType.COLUMNRANGE charts
PlotOptionsErrorBar  
PlotOptionsFunnel Plot options that are specific for ChartType.PIE charts
PlotOptionsGauge Plot options that are specific for ChartType.GAUGE charts
PlotOptionsLine Plot options for ChartType.LINE graphs
PlotOptionsPie Plot options that are specific for ChartType.PIE charts
PlotOptionsScatter Plot options that are specific for ChartType.SCATTER charts
PlotOptionsSeries Generic plot options that will be used for all chart types, unless a chart type specific options are defined.
PlotOptionsSpline Plot options that are specific for ChartType.SPLINE charts
PlotOptionsWaterfall Plot options that are specific for ChartType.WATERFALL charts
RangeSeries Series for range type data
StackLabels The stack labels show the total value for each bar in a stacked column or bar chart.
State Custom styles for various states.
States A wrapper object for all the series options in specific states.
SubTitle The chart's subtitle
Title The Title class represents the title of a chart
Tooltip The Tooltip class holds options for the tooltip, which appears when the user hovers over a series or point.
WaterFallSum DataSeriesItem that can be used as sum or intermediate sum in waterfall charts.
XAxis Adds all X specific fields to Axis
YAxis Adds all Y specific fields to Axis
 

Enum Summary
AxisType Enum representing different axis types.
Cursor You can set the cursor to POINTER("pointer") if you have click events attached to the series, to signal to the user that the points and lines can be clicked.
DashStyle Dash styles used to render lines.
HorizontalAlign Alignment of the title relative to the axis values and more generically horizontal alignment.
LayoutDirection The layout of the legend items.
MarkerSymbolEnum A predefined shape or symbol for the marker.
PointPlacement Possible values: null, ON, BETWEEN.
Stacking Whether to stack the values of each series on top of each other.
StepType Defines different step line types.
TickmarkPlacement For categorized axes only.
TickPosition The position of the tick marks relative to the axis line.
VerticalAlign Alignment of the title relative to the axis values and more generically vertical alignment.
ZoomType Parameters for in what dimensions the user can zoom by dragging the mouse.
